ovdesc.p: Release control is a file containing a single record that holds a number of parameters for controlling the installation of releases. The information held on the file includes:

the names of all live accounts (i.e. accounts to be updated when programs/data are released to live) and their associated run accounts, the company mnemonic for each live account and whether all files in the account are local to it
names of all test accounts and their associated run accounts, company mnemonics and whether the files are local
BPs to be updated with amended inserts
T24 sign on name, password and terminal type to be used when installing a release.
